thread.title: Capstead Mortgage Corporation Declares a $0.16 Per Share First Quarter 2018 Common Dividend and a $0.46875 Per Share First Quarter 2018 Series E Preferred Dividend

author: cnbc.com
title: Capstead Mortgage Corporation Declares a $0.16 Per Share First Quarter 2018 Common Dividend and a $0.46875 Per Share First Quarter 2018 Series E Preferred Dividend
text:
DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Capstead Mortgage Corporation (NYSE: CMO ) announced today that it will pay a first quarter 2018 common dividend of $0.16 per common share on April 20, 2018 to stockholders of record as of March 29, 2018.
Capstead’s Board of Directors also declared a first quarter 2018 dividend of $0.46875 per share on the Company’s 7.50% Series E Cumulative Redeemable Preferred Stock (NYSE: CMOPRE ). This dividend is payable on April 16, 2018, to Series E preferred stockholders of record as of March 29, 2018.
About Capstead
Formed in 1985 and based in Dallas, Texas, Capstead is a self-managed real estate investment trust for federal income tax purposes. The Company earns income from investing in a leveraged portfolio of residential adjustable-rate mortgage pass-through securities issued and guaranteed by government-sponsored enterprises, either Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac, or by an agency of the federal government, Ginnie Mae.
